description: This is the ultimate cocktail recipe for those who are bourbon lovers. This is a traditional&nbsp;iced coffee blended with spiced&nbsp;rum and topped off with bitters.
name: Cold Brew Bourbon
recipeIngredient: ½ oz.Maple syrup (or more to taste)
¼ cup Cold brew coffee concentrate (brew your favorite kind and store in the fridge for up to a week)
Sliced orange and cherries for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the cold brew, bourbon, water, maple syrup, and bitters in a rocks glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cold brew, bourbon, water, maple syrup, and bitters in a rocks glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice cubes and garnish with orange slices and cherry, then serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice cubes and garnish with orange slices and cherry, then serve.
